prodNameC: 維隆希隆補體試驗輔助試劑(未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc:
1. Complement (lyophilized, reconstitute in 1 ml distilled water)
2. Amboceptor (hemolytic anti-sheep erythrocyte serum)
3. Verona I buffer (VB) (dissolve content of 1 vial (powder) in 2 liter distilled water)
4. Erythrocytes (50% whole blood suspension in Alsever solution (sheep erythrocytes))
5. 1% Erythrocyte suspension (sheep)
6. Hemolytic system for CFT
applicantName: 台灣信錡股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市新店區安民街190巷22號6樓
efficacy: 本系統為補體試驗所需之通用試劑，可適用於任何種類的補體試驗。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
